pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Small Collection of New Geometries, and Stats for 'ggplot2' // A collection of new geometries and stats for 'ggplot2'. geom_pointless() adds minimal emphasis to your plots making it easy to highlight some observations. This layer provides additional context. Or just some visual sugar. geom_lexis() draws a 45 lifeline of an event that mimics lexis diagrams.
